```{r}
load("BikeDay.Rdata")
X <- as.matrix(day[day$yr==1,c(10,14)])
pairs(X)
```

## 1. model based clustering assuming a Gaussian Mixture Model

```{r}
library(mclust)
GMM <- Mclust(X,G=2:6,modelNames="VVV")
plot(GMM_3, "BIC")
plot(GMM_3, "classification")
plot(GMM_3, "uncertainty")
plot(GMM_3, "density")
#summary(GMM,parameters=TRUE)
```
